title: I don't like these boards
body: Why did GD have to die again?

replies.body:
Currently we are locking all discussion about board feedback.

In the last 24 hours we have had hundreds of threads to communicate issues about the boards, due to this we are requesting you post all comments to this mega thread - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/lLiAKid9-boards-feedback-mega-discussion

Please go ahead and post your constructive comments over on that discussion.
